Interface IDAOSearchCriteria

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAOSearchBookCriteria, DAOSearchOrderCriteria, DAOSearchUserCriteria

    public interface IDAOSearchCriteria
    The interface contains methods for realization in the class DAOSearchCriteria

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.sql.PreparedStatement preparedStatement(java.sql.Connection conn, java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt, java.lang.String sqlText, java.lang.String orderBYText)
      Method of preparation of parameters of search and creation of inquiry to a DB

    • Method Detail

      • preparedStatement

        java.sql.PreparedStatement preparedStatement(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                             java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt,
                                             java.lang.String sqlText,
                                             java.lang.String orderBYText)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                             javax.naming.NamingException
        Method of preparation of parameters of search and creation of inquiry to a DB
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection with a DB (type of Connection)
        stmt - Inquiry to a DB (type of PreparedStatement)
        sqlText - the text of inquiry to a DB
        orderBYText - part of inquiry to a DB which is responsible for an order of sorting of data
        Returns:
        the inquiry (type of PreparedStatement) prepared for performance
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        javax.naming.NamingException
